hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Freestanding Key

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!
